string.text: A strong, waterproof sleeping bag. Probably the most convenient way of spending a night in the Zone. It won't protect you from radiation or bad dreams, but at least it'll keep you warm
Weak expeditionary rucksack. It's vulcanised, so it's waterproof. You could even put something valuable inside and hide it for months, making it an excellent stash

A strong expeditionary rucksack. It's vulcanised and sutured with better and stronger thread, so it's tough with higher capacity and waterproof. You could even put something valuable inside and hide it for months, making it an excellent stash
Unknown treasure from the 'Last Day' member Master. It can be dangerous to open or to look inside - according to the sign of the death head on him...
